name: Goblin Rush (itch)
description:
Goblin Rush is an 8-bit style arcade game. Use your elevator to guide yourself through the depths of the mines and survive the onslaught of the endless goblin horde.

Controls

  • Use "W" to move up.
  • Use "S" to move down.
  • "A" to shoot left.
  • "D" to shoot right.

Credits

  • Sounds - freesounds.org,
